name: Gourmet's Mayhem
description:
Controls:
  • A: Move left
  • D: Move right
  • Space: Jump
  • E: Throw a critique (Attack)
  • R: Work out. Reduces the fatness.
  • Esc: Pause/Resume the game
UI Explanation:
  • Hot Dog bar: Shows the player the level of fatness they have.
  • Parchment bar: Allows the player to throw a critique when full.
Description:

A game for Ludum Dare 40.

Anton is a gourmet who has read a special review in a culinary newspaper. There is a restaurant which is winning all the food prizes in the city and all of the gourmets are getting... FAT! All of them leave the place with theirs stomachs stretched over the limits, and nobody knows the reason. That is the Anton’s undertaking: solve the (delicious?) mystery...

First Game and Game Jam by BytePlayers Team <3!
